narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Healing Fountain LLC is a Community/Behavioral Health provider based in Mesa, AZ. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $5.3M in Medicaid payments across 31K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $5.3M in Medicaid payments. While not among the largest billers, unusual patterns in providers of this size can still indicate systemic issues worth monitoring.
